message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd be very interested in. I'm asking for $10,000 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your asking price, but I am only willing to pay up to $8,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I need a bit more than $8,000 to make this work. I'm willing to come down to $9,000. This is a great price for the value you'll get from the product.
Hello Alice, I've considered your offer carefully. While I understand the value of the product, I'm still unable to meet the price of $9,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,500.
